title: Who are some rappers who make their own beats? - Quora

response.answer_text: A perfect example of someone who makes their own beats is Soulja Boy. He exclusively produces on FL Studio and has done so since his underground hit which became internationally famous and is known as “Crank That” and countless other songs before and after the initial song. There are many other rappers who make their own beats as well considering that even rappers like Chief Keef have made their own beats and recorded full length songs that have garnered millions of views and streams.
